Store.title: Store
Store.description: Represents a store or business using the platform.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns the store.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the store name.

phone.description: Contact phone number (WhatsApp) for the store.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the store was created.

bannerUrl.description: URL for the store's banner image.

bannerPublicId.description: Public ID for the store's banner image in Cloudinary.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category of products in a store.

storeId.description: The ID of the store this category belongs to.

imagePublicId.description: The Public ID of the image in Cloudinary.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product in a store.

storeId.description: The ID of the store this product belongs to.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category this product belongs to.

imageUrl.description: URL of the product image from Cloudinary.

imagePublicId.description: The Public ID of the image in Cloudinary.

variants.description: List of variants for the product (e.g., size, color).

ProductVariant.title: Product Variant
ProductVariant.description: Represents a group of selectable options for a product.

name.description: The name of the variant group (e.g., 'Size', 'Extras').

options.description: The list of choices for this variant (e.g., ['Small', 'Medium', 'Large']).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. The `userId` is the same as the Firebase Auth UID.

/stores/{storeId}.description: Stores information about each individual store.

/stores/{storeId}/categories/{categoryId.description: Stores product categories for a specific store.

/stores/{storeId}/products/{productId}.description: Stores products for a specific store.
